haha wildlife to hunt.  i watched an ultima online interview a cpl months ago about this aspect of their game when they started out.

Author: Mylo#8306
Content:
ICO have heaps of regulation bs.  correct.
might one day be considered scalping, plus heaps of fraud.

decentralized crowdfund, though - different story.   can have blockchain enforced/validated early access or bonus-multiplier in different eras of the game.  e.g. 
support crowdfund with $5 ...
support crowdfund with $20, get 1.1 multiplier after block 50k, get 1.2 multiplier after block 250k.
support crowdund with $50 get 1.2 multiplier after block 50k, get 1.25 multiplier after block 250k +  gift a $5 crowdfunder with multiplier 1.2 after block 250k

lots of crowdfund gift mulitplier possibiliites.
